<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 280, 170, 291]]<|/det|> **PHYSICS** <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 301, 235, 312]]<|/det|> Paper 3 Extended <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 341, 415, 353]]<|/det|> Candidates answer on the Question Paper. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 361, 368, 372]]<|/det|> No Additional Materials are required. <|ref|>title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 393, 386, 405]]<|/det|> # READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS FIRST <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 419, 718, 432]]<|/det|> Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 434, 325, 445]]<|/det|> Write in dark blue or black pen. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 448, 462, 460]]<|/det|> You may use a pencil for any diagrams or graphs. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 462, 598, 474]]<|/det|> Do not use staples, paper clips, highlighters, glue or correction fluid. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 476, 384, 488]]<|/det|> DO **NOT** WRITE IN ANY BARCODES. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 503, 255, 514]]<|/det|> Answer **all** questions. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 516, 632, 528]]<|/det|> You may lose marks if you do not show your working or if you do not use <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 530, 225, 542]]<|/det|> appropriate units. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 544, 636, 556]]<|/det|> Take the weight of 1kg to be 10N (i.e. acceleration of free fall \(=10m/s^{2}\) ). <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 571, 602, 583]]<|/det|> At the end of the examination, fasten all your work securely together. <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 585, 695, 611]]<|/det|> The number of marks is given in brackets [ ] at the end of each question or part question. <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[710, 500, 905, 850]]<|/det|>
